caption.p: Changes in areas of climatic suitability for maize among the current five major maize producers. For example, under current conditions China is modelled to have 48% of its territory with some climatic suitability for maize cultivation, with an increase of 4% expected by 2050 and 5% by 2100. ArcMap 10.2 ( http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap).
